attributes.action: Hold by-elections where the majority have voted Leave but the MP is Remain
attributes.background: The decision to vote Leave was made in the Referendum and if assessed on a constituency basis, would have resulted in a huge majority of Leave MPs in Parliament. The danger of Remainer MPs going against the expressed will of the people is clear, but holding by-elections will resolve the issue.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views and opinions.
